Detailed Description

Header file for uvm_callback.

Generic callback agent for both functions/methods Allows subject to specify/enforce argument type required by observer callback function/method. The variable would be passed to the observer from the subject.

Limitations: 1. Currently supports one argument only for callback functions/methods 2. Does not support 'void' as the argument (requires template specialization) 3. Does not examine the return type from the function (callback)
